actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 121 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the exclusion from gross income of gain on the sale of a principal residence held for more than 5 years provided by that section will be available without regard to the age of the taxpayer.

summary.text: Provides that the exclusion from gross income under the Internal Revenue Code presently allowable to those over age 65 with respect to gain on the sale of a principal residence held for more than 5 years shall be available without regard to the age of the taxpayer.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 121 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the exclusion from gross income of gain on the sale of a principal residence held for more than 5 years provided by that section will be available without regard to the age of the taxpayer.
